medical_history.chief_complaint: Transient periorbital and ankle edema and weight gain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began transiently, with periorbital and ankle edema accompanied by weight gain, increasing from a usual weight of 140 lb to 155 lb.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Unremarkable medical history; had urinary tract infections in her 20s and 30s.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died of breast carcinoma in her 40s; father, a smoker, died of lung cancer in his 60s. One daughter carries the same mutation but is asymptomatic; family history of kidney disease is not known.
medical_history.social_history: Denies smoking tobacco or drinking alcohol, even socially. No recent routine medical care, travels, pets, or insect bites noted.
